name: The House of the Dead: Remake
overview: A remade version of the game introduced in 1997 in arcade platform. A classic arcade rail-shooter receives a whole new entourage and gameplay changes to suit modern gaming standards. Features: • Well known arcade classic with modern graphics and controls, including gyro aiming • True to the original gameplay • Local 2-player multiplayer • Multiple endings • Photomode • Achievements • Armory with unlockable weapons • Hordes of the undead monstrosities in a new game mode • Gallery with encountered enemies and bosses
